document_data.name: Delasko Sornstern
document_data.mainbody: '''Delasko Sornstern''' was a [[Cormyrean]] noble in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Per [[Marlin Stormserpent]], he was nothing but a toady of [[Broryn Windstag]].
document_data.Relationships:
Delasko Sornstern was a constant in [[Broryn Windstag]]'s entourage, and the two were generally companions to [[Kathkote Dawntard]].{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|68|6}} [[Arclath Delcastle]] knew him to be associated with Marlin Stormserpent, [[Mellast Ormblade]], [[Sacrast Handragon]] and [[Irlin Stonestable]], as well as two other lords around Arclath's own age, Broryn Windstag and Kathkote Dawntard.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|364|34}}

He was the son of [[Haedro Sornstern]], and the heir of the [[Sornstern]] family.
